Today in Pembrokeshire, swell is solid at 5 ft @9s WSW with fresh 17 mph SW winds. Good spots like Abereiddy and Whitesands Bay are working well, especially during the mid-tide pushes. Tomorrow, the swell drops slightly to 4 ft @10s with lighter 15 mph S winds, still providing fun waves across the coast. By the day after, conditions improve further with 3 ft @9s WSW and light 8 mph WNW winds, making it a great day for a surf. Best: day after.
